mapper.select: select * from users where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.update: update users set u_email=#{u_email},u_pnum=#{u_pnum} where u_id=#{u_id}
update users set u_pwd=#{u_pwd} where u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select b.b_date, b.b_code, m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time, b.b_count, mo.mo_date-1 as mr_date, b.b_state from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} and to_char(b.b_date,'yyyy-mm') = #{bookingDate} order by b.b_date desc

select b.b_date, b.b_code, m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time, b.b_count, mo.mo_date-1 as mr_date, b.b_state from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} and to_char(mo.mo_date,'yyyy-mm') = #{bookingDate} order by b.b_date desc

select b.b_date, b.b_code, m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time, b.b_count, mo.mo_date-1 as mr_date, b.b_state from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} order by b.b_date desc

select b.b_date, b.b_code, m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time, b.b_count, mo.mo_date-1 as mr_date, b.b_state from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} and b_date >= sysdate-#{bookingDay} order by b.b_date desc

select b.b_date, b.b_code, m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time, b.b_count, mo.mo_date-1 as mr_date, b.b_state from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} and b_date >= add_months(sysdate, -#{bookingMonth}) order by b.b_date desc

select sysdate-to_date(to_char(mo.mo_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || mo.mo_time || ':00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.b_code=#{b_code}
select count(*) from musical_review where b_code=#{b_code}
select count(*) from like_actor where u_id=#{u_id}
select count(*) from like_musical where u_id=#{u_id}

select m.m_code, m.m_title,m.m_poster,m.m_age,to_char(m.m_startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as m_startdate,to_char(m.m_enddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as m_enddate from musical m left join like_musical lm on lm.m_code=m.m_code and lm.u_id='test' where lm.lm_code is null and m.m_title like #{searchMusical} order by m.m_code
mapper.delete: delete from like_actor where la_code=#{la_code} and u_id=#{u_id}
delete from like_musical where lm_code=#{lm_code} and u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.select: select u_mpass from users where u_id=#{u_id}
select mp_enddate-sysdate from mpass where u_id=#{u_id}
select * from mpass where u_id = #{u_id}
select * from calendar

select ma.ma_name ||' - '|| m.m_title as calendar_title, mo.mo_date as calendar_start, mo.mo_date as calendar_end from like_actor la left join musical_actor ma on la.ma_code=ma.ma_code left join musical_casting mc on ma.ma_code=mc.ma_code left join musical_option mo on mc.mo_code=mo.mo_code left join musical m on mo.m_code=m.m_code where la.u_id=#{u_id} and mo.mo_date is not null

select m.m_title || ' - ' || mo.mo_time as calendar_title, mo.mo_date as calendar_start, mo.mo_date as calendar_end from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.u_id = #{u_id} and b.b_state = 1 group by m.m_title, mo.mo_date, mo.mo_time

select b.b_code, b.b_date, b.b_type, b.b_state, mo.mo_date, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, mh.mh_addr, bd.bd_code, bd.bd_state, bd.bd_price, d.d_num, d.d_name, s.s_section, s.s_position, s.s_row, s.s_floor, sg.sg_name, sp.sp_price, u.u_name from booking b left join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code=b.mo_code left join musical m on m.m_code=mo.m_code left join musical_hall mh on mh.mh_code=m.mh_code left join booking_detail bd on bd.b_code=b.b_code left join discount d on d.d_code=bd.d_code left join seat s on s.s_code=bd.s_code left join seat_grade sg on sg.sg_code=s.sg_code left join seat_price sp on sp.sg_code=s.sg_code left join users u on u.u_id=b.u_id where b.b_code=#{b_code} order by bd.bd_code

select sysdate-to_date(to_char(mo.mo_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || mo.mo_time || ':00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from booking b join musical_option mo on mo.mo_code = b.mo_code join musical m on mo.m_code = m.m_code where b.b_code=#{b_code} order by b.b_date desc
select count(*) from seat_review where bd_code=#{bd_code}

select mr.mr_code,mr.b_code,mr.mr_score,mr.mr_title,mr.mr_content,to_char(mr.mr_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as mr_date, m.m_title from musical_review mr left join booking b on b.b_code=mr.b_code left join musical_option mo on b.mo_code=mo.mo_code left join musical m on mo.m_code=m.m_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} order by mr_date desc

select sr.sr_code, sr.bd_code, sr.sr_score, sr.sr_content, to_char(sr.sr_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as sr_date, s.s_section, s.s_position, s.s_row, s.s_floor,mh.mh_name,mh.mh_addr from seat_review sr left join booking_detail bd on bd.bd_code=sr.bd_code left join booking b on b.b_code=bd.b_code left join seat s on s.s_code=bd.s_code left join musical_hall_layout mhl on mhl.mhl_code=s.mhl_code left join musical_hall mh on mh.mh_code=mhl.mh_code where b.u_id=#{u_id} order by sr_date desc
